description:
List all notifications for the current user, sorted by most recently updated.

The following example uses the `since` parameter to list notifications that have been updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: If `true`, show notifications marked as read.

parameters.name: participating
parameters.description: If `true`, only shows notifications in which the user is directly participating or mentioned.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Only show notifications updated before the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
